mapper.select: SELECT a.order_no as orderNo, a.id as purchaseDetailId, a.order_num AS orderNum, a.arrival_num AS arrivalNum, a.purchase_price as purchasePrice, b.number, b.NAME as productName, b.spec, b.version, c.NAME AS unitName, d.NAME AS supplierName, e.NAME AS venderName FROM pd_purchase_detail a LEFT JOIN pd_purchase_order f ON f.order_no = a.order_no LEFT JOIN pd_product b ON a.product_id = b.id LEFT JOIN pd_unit c ON b.unit_id = c.id LEFT JOIN pd_supplier d ON b.supplier_id = d.id LEFT JOIN pd_vender e ON b.vender_id = e.id WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND f.merge_order_no = #{mergeOrderNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE pd_purchase_order SET audit_status = #{auditStatus}, refuse_reason = #{refuseReason}, audit_by = #{auditBy}, audit_date = #{auditDate}, submit_status=#{submitStatus} WHERE order_no IN ${orderNos}
